title: "Waymo begins fully driverless robotaxi rides in SF"
excerpt: "Waymo has started giving fully driverless robotaxi rides to its employees in San Francisco. The company also announced its plan to open up its robotaxi service in downtown Phoenix. This morning, an all-electric Jaguar I-PACE picked up a Waymo engineer on their way to work."
